articles.title: Valorant will start monitoring your voice chats starting July 13th - The Verge
articles.description: Valorant developer Riot Games announced that it will start evaluating players’ voice chats in North America starting July 13th. Riot says it will use these chat logs to help build a better player reporting system.
articles.content:
Its part of Riots efforts to crack down on disruptive behavior
